description: Ms. codex. Spine title. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on the second leaf. Records follows erroneous foliation. Physical description: 23 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on tan glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Mild insect damage.
contents: 1. leaves 1b-101a: Sharḥ Mabādī al-uṣūl / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Jurjānī.
2. leaves 102b-153b: Sharḥ Dirāyat al-ḥadīth / al-Shahīd al-Thānī.
extent: 154 leaves : paper ; 206 x 123 (145 x 60) mm bound to 206 x 123 mm
provenance: Stamp on leaf 102a dated 1033 H [1623 or 1624]. On leaf 1a, several stamps and a note dated 1315 H [1897 or 1898].
dlme_provenance_en: Stamp on leaf 102a dated 1033 H [1623 or 1624]. On leaf 1a, several stamps and a note dated 1315 H [1897 or 1898].
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Limp golden-brown leather with blind-tooled central star and fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
